Amara Karan (amụrụ afọ 1984) bu onye ome ihe nkiri bekee nke mere ihe nkiri ya mbụ dika Rita na ihe nkiri Wes Anderson  bu The Darjeeling Limited
Emere ihe nkiri a na 2007 Venice Film Festival
Ọrụ ihe nkiri nke abụọ Karan bụ dị ka ụmụ akwụkwọ Peaches na ihe nkiri 2007 St Trinian's
O mere ihe ngosi ọgbọ mbụ ya na 2008 dị ka Jessica na mmepụta RSC nke The Merchant nke Venice yana dị ka Bianca na mmepụta RSC nke The Taming of the Shrew
Na nke ikpeazụ, ọ mere mpụta mbụ  West End ya na Novello Theatre
N'afọ 2016, ọ rụkọrọ ọrụ na obere usoro ihe nkiri mpụ HBO, The Night Of
N'afọ 2012, o tinyere aka na fim A Fantastic Fear of everything
A mụrụ Karan na Wimbledon, London na 1984 nye nne na nna Sri-Lankan Tamil ndị si Zambia kwaga Britain afọ abụọ tupu a mụọ ya
A zụlitere ya na Wimbledon wee gaa ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị Wimbledon

Karan gara n'ihu na-agụ akwụkwọ na St Catherine's College, Oxford  na mgbe ọ malitere ime ihe nkiri amateur gụnyere Sunday Morning na Center of the World na Burton Taylor Theater nke ọ nwetara nyocha dị egwu  ma bụrụkwa onye a họpụtara ahọpụta
maka arụmọrụ ya na When We Are Married na Ụlọ ihe nkiri Old Fire
N'oge ya na Oxford, Karan dere, duzie, mepụta, ma mee ihe nkiri dị mkpirikpi, By Myself, nke bịara na nke abụọ na 2002 Shoestring Shorts Competition
Ọ malitere ọrụ ya dị ka onye na-etinye ego na ụlọ akụ (na Hawkpoint na CIBC World Markets) ọkachamara na njikọta na ịzụrụ.  tupu ọ mụọ maka akara MA na ime ihe na  The Arts Educational Schools London
O buru Torch Olympic nke 2008 n'oge ya na London
Kemgbe 2016, ya na onye na-eme ihe nkiri Jamie de Courcey na-enwe mmekọrịta
